transcript: Customer: Boss main aapko call karta hu abhi main kahin petrol mein hu. Karta hu aapko call.\nExecutive: Theek hai theek hai.\n
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was busy at a petrol pump.
- Stated he will call back.


Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's situation.


Next Steps: 
- Customer will call the executive back.

Alert (If Any):
None

- Neutral -> Neutral | Non-urgent

- callback, customer busy
